options.name: Fledgling Primalist
options.description: You have trained to channel primal spells. Gain +1 skill with primal magic.

options.name: Action : Kinesis
options.description: You make a ranged spell attack using your primal magic skill at a target within a short (10 unit) distance. For each dice that hits, deal 3 physical damage.

options.name: Reaction : Draw Nature
options.description: In response to taking heat, cold or electric damage from a spell or effect, you absorb the extra energy. When taking 3 or more electric damage, your energy is completely restored. Taking heat or cold damage restores your energy by 1.

options.name: Of the Elements
options.description: You are attuned to the elements and gain +1 mitigation to heat, cold and electric damage.

options.name: Anchored
options.description: You are naturally anchored to the world, gaining +1 skill with endurance and making you immune from stun or daze conditions caused by electric effects. Additionally, you gain seismic detection when standing on natural terrain up to a moderate (20 unit) distance.

options.name: Studied Magic
options.description: Your experience with primal magic has led to greater understanding. Gain +1 skill with magic knowledge and +1 spell capacity.

options.name: Skilled Primalist
options.description: You have trained extensively with primal spells. Gain +1 skill with primal magic.

options.name: Daily Action : Primal Overcharge
options.description: You channel a primal spell you know by using resolve instead of energy, even if the spell is fizzled. This spell channels even if you fail your spell check.

options.name: Reaction : Dampen Elements
options.description: In response to an effect or spell that deals either heat, cold or electric damage, you create a blanket of counteracting magic within a very short (5 unit) radius, protecting anyone inside, granting them all 3 mitigation to electric, heat and cold damage. Additionally, creatures cannot become frozen, ignited, stunned or dazed from this attack.

options.name: Talented Primalist
options.description: Your relentless training has resulted in +1 talent with primal magic spells.
